item.description: Contact Email: spphd@nus.edu.sg Faculty webpage: https://lkyspp.nus.edu.sg/our-people/faculty/han-dan Office address: Lee Kuan Yew School of Public Policy
Publications Han, Dan, Emma Clarke-Deelder, Nora Miller et al. Health Care Provider Decision-Making and the Quality of Maternity Care: An Analysis of Postpartum Care in Kenyan Hospitals.

Working Papers “Workload and Team Performance,” with Margaret McConnell and Emma Clarke-Deelder Excessive provider workload can lead to changes in care procedures in ways that affect patient outcomes.

Courses taught at the Lee Kuan Yew School Core Policy Challenges: Spring 2021, Spring 2022, Spring 2023 Policy Analysis Exercise (Capstone): Spring 2024, Spring 2025 Electives Health Economics and Public Policy: Spring 2021, Fall 2021, Fall 2022, Fall 2023, Fall 2024 Cost-Benefit Analysis in Public Policy: Spring 2022, Spring 2023 Globalization, Health, and Human Development: Spring 2024, Spring 2025
